Instance.description: A Drama Node that asks a player-controlled Sim for an NPC Sim to be invited to a Club.

TunableVariant.name: invite_only
TunableVariant.description: If specified, then only Clubs of the appropriate invite exclusivity type are valid for this Drama Node.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: If checked, only invite-only Clubs are valid. If unchecked, only open membership Clubs are valid.
